DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine cost-effectiveness function-centred treatment ( FCT ) compare pain-centred treatment ( PCT ) patient chronic low back pain ( LBP ) in-patient set . Follow-up last three year . Direct indirect cost record questionnaire send health insurance , employer Swiss Disability Insurance Company .
DOC.brief_title: Cost Long Term Disability Patients With Chronic Non-Specific Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Chronic low back pain , sick leave 6 week last 6 month able perform training program
